summary: J'Zargo Has Become Stronger As a Mage And No Longer Cast Weak Spells And Learned A Few other Things And Has finally Earned His Archmage Robe He Dreamed Of..... He Also uses Shouts!!!
descriptionHtml:
J'zargo is Now More useful then ever before because Fact is he was horrible in The Vanilla Game Using Only sparks to fight  ._. He now knows Expert Destruction spells and Defensive Spells etc He Has Learn The Thu'um I Don't Know Where But he Did. New Perks For His Style of Warfare. He is finally worth using.

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60366-2-1417250151.jpg[/img]
Make J'zargo Apart Of Your A Team Again :D.

 [img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60366-1-1417262987.jpg[/img]
He Can Destroy Mostly Everything that comes his way

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60366-3-1417250151.jpg[/img]
J'zargo Tried To Smell Mirrak he didn't Like The idea very much



[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60366-1-1417263049.jpg[/img]
No More Sparks xD

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60366-1-1417261543.jpg[/img]
This Guy:)





No DlC Required Should Work Fine With Any Mod [img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60366-5-1417250151.jpg[/img]
Level 100 At Start Then Levels Up WIth you Be Warned He is Way More Powerful Not Recommended for Low Lvl Characters.....!
Still Will Be At The College.

Any Other NPC you love But is Weak Leave a comment and i might work on it :)
